title: OPL Split 2 Week 1 Tipping
body:
Hey everyone!

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/opl_split_1_announce.jpg?itok=aX-Y1qp7

Split 2 Week 1 of the [Oceanic Pro League](http://oce.lolesports.com/schedule) is fast approaching!
I want to see who you think will win, check out the links below and put in your vote!
The tipping form will close at 5:30 pm AEDT on the 25th of May.

[Click here](http://goo.gl/forms/F6nTzZdWKe) to go to the tipping form

This week anyone that can pick **8 matches** correctly will get the **250 RP!** 

You can catch all the action at our [twitch channel](http://www.twitch.tv/riotgamesoceania) starting Monday 25th of May at 6pm AEDT

Comment below with what you picked and why!

replies.body: I have put tips it says saved tips  but not sure how it works because there no where to go after saved tip and when load again and put in Summoner Name not show who I have picked and have pick agiain
